title: CANCELED—Art + Language: Studio (Multiday Teacher Workshop)
description:
THIS PROGRAM HAS BEEN CANCELED

Three-Day Workshop: August 6–8

What goes on in students’ minds when they make art? How is language activated through material manipulation, design, and aesthetic engagement? Learn by doing in this three-day workshop and discover how art making has the power to deepen language learning for English and World Language Learners by engaging different modalities. Explore a variety of media to reflect on making and language learning. No special skills are required, only an open mind and a willingness to experiment.

This program will focus on the exhibition Never a Lovely So Real: Photography and Film in Chicago, 1950–1980.


For additional Teacher Workshops please visit the Teacher Programs Calendar.

If you have any questions or special needs, please call (312) 443-9092 or email teacherworkshops@artic.edu.
